name: Bulwark
text:
**Choose one –**
- **This round**: You and friendly units in radius cannot be moved, pushed, swapped, or forced to move by enemy heroes.
- If your discard is empty, retrieve this card.

name: Onslaught
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move into the space it occupied, if able.

name: Leap Forward
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move into the space it occupied, if able.

name: Mad Dash
text:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.
_(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack.)_

name: Bullrush
text: Before the attack: Move 2 or 3 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.

name: Furious Charge
text: Before the attack: Move 2, 3 or 4 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.

name: Throwing Axe
text:
Before the attack: You may discard a card. If you do, +2 ::range:: Range.
Target a unit in range.

name: Throwing Spear
text:
Before the attack: You may discard a card. +2 ::range:: Range if you have a card in the discard.
Target a unit in range.

name: Shield
text: **This round:** When any friendly minion in radius would be defeated, you may discard a card. If you do, the minion is not defeated.

name: Bolster
text: **This round:** When any friendly minion in radius would be defeated, you may discard a card. If you do, the minion is not defeated.

name: Fortify
text: **This round:** When any friendly minion in radius would be defeated, you may discard a card. If you do, the minion is not defeated.

name: War Drummer
text: A friendly hero in range may retrieve a discarded card if either you, or that hero, is adjacent to an enemy unit.

name: Master Skald
text: A friendly hero in range may retrieve a resolved or discarded card if either you, or that hero, is adjacent to an enemy unit.

name: Brutal Jab
text:
**Choose one —**
- Remove a token adjacent to you.
- Push an enemy minion adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Mighty Punch
text:
Move up to 1 space, then **Choose one —**
- Remove a token adjacent to you.
- Push an enemy minion adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Savage Kick
text:
Move up to 1 space, then **Choose one —**
- Remove a token adjacent to you.
- Push an enemy minion adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Shield Bash
text: An enemy hero adjacent to you, who has played an attack card this turn, discards a card, if able.

name: Counterattack
text: An enemy hero adjacent to you, who has played an attack card this turn, discards a card, or is defeated.

name: One Man Army
text: You count as 2 minions during minion battle. If you would be removed during minion battle, you lose the push instead.
